Graph

gt_graph.Rd

Graph

gt_graph(gt)

Arguments

gt

An object of class graphTweets as returned by gt_edges.

Value

An object of class igraph.

Examples

# simulate dataset
tweets <- data.frame(
  text = c("I tweet @you about @him",
           "I tweet @me about @you"),
  screen_name = c("me", "him"),
  retweet_count = c(19, 5),
  status_id = c(1, 2),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

tweets %>%
  gt_edges(text, screen_name, status_id) %>%
  gt_nodes() %>%
  gt_graph() -> net
